name: Marquee
description: A lightweight React component that utilizes the power of CSS animations to create silky smooth marquees.

properties.name: start
properties.label: Play
properties.settingTooltip: Whether to play or pause the marquee

properties.name: pauseOnHover
properties.label: Pause On Hover
properties.settingTooltip: Whether to pause the marquee when hovered

properties.name: pauseOnClick
properties.label: Pause On Click
properties.settingTooltip: Whether to pause the marquee when clicked

properties.name: direction
properties.label: Direction
properties.settingTooltip: The direction the marquee is sliding

properties.name: delay
properties.label: Delay
properties.settingTooltip: Duration to delay the animation after render, in seconds

properties.name: loop
properties.label: Loop
properties.settingTooltip: The number of times the marquee should loop, 0 is equivalent to infinite

properties.name: gradient
properties.label: Enable Gradient
properties.settingTooltip: Whether to show the gradient overlay or not

eventHandlers.name: onFinish
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: A callback for when the marquee finishes scrolling and stops. Only calls if loop is non-zero.
eventHandlers.label: On Finish Event

eventHandlers.name: onCycleComplete
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: A callback for when the marquee finishes a loop. Does not call if maximum loops are reached (use onFinish instead).
eventHandlers.label: On Cycle Complete Event
